    def sum(A,n):
    sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if A[i] % 2 == 0:
            sum += A[i]
    return sum

def sum2(A,n)
    sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i, n):
            sum += A[i] * A[j]
    return sum
